measured_by: experience-sampling ICCs of anger, guilt, sadness, shame ratings
justification: "Following Cameron et al. (2013) we computed the z-score normalized ICCs of these ratings for each participant … to compute the degree of trait-level negative emotional granularity."

measured_by: BERT-based contextual differentiation (1 – Cronbach’s α of emotion-label embeddings)
justification: "We utilize the BERT Large Language Model … to measure the granularity with which consumers describe their emotions… Once the feature vectors … are calculated, we use the Cronbach's alpha statistic … and subtract this statistic from 1 so that a higher score indicates higher … granularity."
